257062.ゴーラの国で出会った ペペロゴーラくん。\nおじいさんの マデサゴーラさんを超え:
Peperogora, whom we met in the land of Gora.
He was determined to become a better artist
than his grandfather, Madesagora.

257063.私にスケッチブックをくれたのも ペペロくん。\nこの絵を見せたら なんて言うかし:
It was Pepero who gave me his sketchbook. I
wonder what he would say if I showed him this
picture.

257064.……うーん。\n前髪は もう少し 尖らせたほうがいいかな？\nペペロくん すごく:
...hmm. Maybe I should make the bangs a little
more pointed? Pepero was very particular
about his hairstyle.

257065.ゴーラから ファラザードへ 連れさられたけど\nみんな とても 優しく接してくれ:
I was taken from Gora to Farazard and everyone
was so nice to me. Najinn... and Yushka...

257066.ふたりは お互いを 心から信じ合っていたわ。\nだから ナジーンは 自分の命と引:
They believed in each other with all their
hearts. That is why Najinn gave his life to
protect Yushka.

257067.ユシュカは 深く 傷ついていたけれど\nナジーンの死を 乗り越えたのね。\nそし:
Yushka was deeply hurt, but he got over
Najinn's death. And he made a decision to
support you.

257068.ユシュカは 魔界のため ナジーンのため……\nそして あなたのために 戦い続ける:
Yushka will continue to fight for Demon World,
for Najinn... and for you. You should support
Yushka, too.

257069.アスバルを捜す途中で いろんな人と出会ったわ。\nリンベリィや オーディス王子。:
I met all kinds of people on my way to find
Asbal. Linberry, Prince Odis. Mr. Boggan
really did sound just like Asbal.

257070.リンベリィは 強引なところがあるけれど\nアスバルを助けるために 手を尽くしてく:
Linberry can be pushy, but he went out of his
way to help Asbal. You must think very highly
of him.

257071.そういえば 別れ際 リンベリィに\nアンタには負けないからッ！ って言われたけど:
By the way, when we said goodbye, Linberry
said to me, "I won't lose to you!" I wonder if
we're going to have some kind of a match...?

257072.信頼していた 叔父さんに裏切られ\n自ら お母さんを手にかけて……\nそれでも:
Betrayed by an uncle he trusted, and even
taking his own mother's hand, Asbal still
chose the path of a king.

257073.アスバルと お母さんのエルガドーラさん。\nふたりの間にあった感情は 複雑で\n:
Asbal and his mother, Elgadora. The feelings
between them are complicated, and I don't know
all of them, but...

257074.これから 魔王として\nゼクレスの人たちを 守っていくと決めた\nアスバルの覚悟:
I think Asbal's determination to protect the
people of Zechres as a Demon King from now on
is wonderful.

257075.ティリアという女の子として トポルの村で\n幸せそうに暮らしていた ヴァレリアさ:
Valeria was living happily in Topol Village as
a girl named Tilia. She looked totally
different from usual...

257076.子供のころから 兵士として戦ってきた\nヴァレリアさんにとって ティリアさんの生:
For Valeria, who has been fighting as a soldier since she was a child, Tilia's life may have been something she had always longed
for.

257077.トポルの村に行ったとき フェアネおばあちゃんが\n私にも クラムパイを 食べさせ:
When we went to Topol Village, Grandma Fearne
gave me a piece of Crumb Pie. It was so
delicious. It was so good.

257078.行方不明になっていた ヴァレリアさんは\nトポルの村で か弱い女の子として\n静:
Miss Valeria, who had gone missing, lived
quietly as a frail girl in Topol Village.

257079.けれど トポルの村の人たちや バルディスタ……\nそして 魔界のために 平穏な暮:
But for the sake of the people of Topol Village, Valdista... and the Demon World, he decided to leave his peaceful life behind and
return to Demon King Valeria.

257080.ヴァレリアさんを 氷の魔女と 呼ぶ人もいるけど\n本当は 優しくて 温かい人。\:
Some people call Valeria the Ice Witch, but
she's really a kind and warm person. And... of
course, she's very strong.

257081.みんなに認められて あなたは 大魔王になった。\n魔仙卿だけでなく 三人の魔王た:
You were recognized by everyone and became the
Great Demon King. Not only Oracle, but also
the three Demon Kings... and me, of course.

257082.ペペロくんだって あなたのために\n玉座を作ってくれたのに……魔仙卿が 突然\n:
Even Mr. Pepero made a throne for you and then
suddenly Oracle ruined the coronation.

257083.……魔仙卿の真意は わからない。\nけれど 大魔王という光を得た 魔界の人たちは:
I don't know what Oracle's true intentions are. But I believe that the people of Demon World, who have gained the light of Great
Demon King, will surely overcome the Age of Miasma.

257084.チカラの弱い 魔物たちが\n魔仙卿に守られて暮らす ジャディンの園。\n魔界の楽:
Jyadain Garden, where weak monsters live under
the protection of Oracle. It is called the
Utopia of Demon World.

257085.穏やかで 優しい場所。\nきれいなお花や かわいい魔物たち……\n希望と 光に:
A calm and gentle place. It's filled with Wish
Flowers, cute monsters, hope and light.

257086.私は ここが大好きよ。\nそういえば ジャディンの園の光は\nあなたと よく似て:
I love it here. Come to think of it, the light
in Jyadain Garden looks a lot like yours.

257087.大審門……。\n大魔王たりうる者が 集まった時にだけ\n開かれる 審判の門。:
The Demongate... A gate of judgment that
opens only when those who could be Great Demon
King gather.

257088.あなたは この門を通って\nいくつもの試練と戦いを くぐり抜け\n私を 見つけだ:
You have passed through many trials and
battles to find me through these gates.

257089.もし ユシュカが あなたを\n大審門に 連れてこなければ\n私……あなたに 会え:
If Yushka had not brought you to the
Demongate, I might not have met you.

257090.そう思って ユシュカに「ありがとう」って\n言ったら 「いきなり どうした？」っ:
So I said, "Thank you for Yushka," and all of
a sudden he was like, "What's wrong?" He
looked at me strangely.

257091.海を 描いてみたくなったの。\nアストルティアの海は 青くて\n魔界の海は 赤い:
I wanted to paint the sea. The sea in Astoltia
is blue and the sea in Demon World is red.

257092.スケッチしている途中で 大きな生き物が\n海面から 飛び出してきたわ。\nあれは:
I was in the middle of sketching when this big
creature just jumped out of the water. Was
it... a monster? Or a fish?

257093.すごく 大きな 身体をしているのに\nあんなに高く ジャンプできるのね。\nびっ:
I was amazed at how he could jump so high for
such a big guy. I was so surprised.

257094.ヴァレリアさんから 聞いたの。ターボル峡谷は\n魔瘴の影響が強い バルディスタで:
Valeria told me about it. She told me that Tabor Gorge is a rare place for flowers to bloom in Valdista, where demon miasma has a
strong influence.

257095.ここのお花は 小さくて 可憐に見えるのに……\nきっと 生命力が 強いのね。\n:
The flowers here look small and pretty, but
they must have a strong life force. They are
firmly rooted in the earth...

257096.近くに きれいな青い花が咲いていたから\n摘んでかえって ヴァレリアさんにあげた:
There were some beautiful blue flowers nearby, so I picked them and gave them to Valeria. I gave them to Valeria as a thank you for
telling me about Tabor Gorge.

257097.魔幻園マデッサンスへ行くために\nマデサゴーラさんが作った 乗り物ね。:
This is the vehicle that Madesagora made to go
to Demon Park Madessaince.

257098.奈落へいざなう棺桶……。\nなんだか おそろしい名前だけれど\n私は とても 楽:
Coffin to the Abyss... a rather frightening
name, but I enjoyed it very much.

257099.また 乗ってみたいな。\nあなたと一緒に…………。: I'd like to ride again. With you...

257100.魔瘴塚のまわりを 走り回っていた子……\n植物なんですって。\nアスバルが 教え:
The girl who was running around the
miasmound... she's a plant. Asbal told me.

257101.名前は アルキニカアマストラム。\nでも トコトコ草って呼ばれているんですって。:
Its name is Arcinica amastrum. But they call
it Tokotoko grass.

257102.綺麗な水場でしか 生きられないらしいの。\nだから 魔瘴塚を浄化したことを\n喜:
They can only live in clean water. That's why
they were so happy that we purified the
miasmound.

257103.まるで お礼を言うみたいに\n私のまわりを トコトコ走って\nとっても かわいら:
He was so cute, running around me like he was
thanking me.

257104.ゼクレス魔導国の名所 ベルヴァイン湖。\nスケッチをしていて 清々しい気持ちにな:
Belvain Lake, a famous landmark in Zechres. It
felt so refreshing to be sketching there.

257105.毎年 ベルヴァイン湖に 渡ってくる\n銀翼竜の群れを 見るのを\n楽しみにしてい:
Many people look forward to seeing the herds
of silver pterosaurs that migrate to Belvain
Lake every year.

257106.……あなたは もう見たの？\nうらやましいわ。私も見てみたい……。\nいつか 見:
You've already seen it? I'm jealous. I want to
see it too... I hope I get to see it someday.

259968.噴出した魔瘴を止めるため ザハディガル岩峰の\n遠征軍駐屯地に 向かったけれど…:
I went to the Expeditionary Force camp at the Zahadigal Pinnacle to stop the demon miasma from erupting, but...someone had already
dispelled it.

259969.謎のフードの集団……アンルシアさんたちは\nルクスガルン大門を通って\nアストル:
A mysterious group of hooded people...Ann and
her friends must have come to Demon World from
Astoltia through the Great Gate of Luxgarn.

259970.アンルシアさんたち 大魔王城へたどり着くまでに\nジャリムバハ砂漠をさまよったり:
Ann and her friends had to wander through the Jyarimbaha Desert and buy expensive equipment at Farazard Castle before reaching the Great
Demon King's castle.

259971.……そう言えば ジルガモットさんが\nバザールで ぼったくられて？……いる\nフ:
...Speaking of which, did Mr. Jirgamot get ripped off at the bazaar? ...I think he was talking about the group of four hooded guys
who are there.

259972.ナラジア……私に会うために\n大魔王城まで来たって 言ってた。\nあんなに ボロ:
Narasia... she said she came all the way to
the Great Demon Castle to see me. She was so
torn up...

259973.どうして 私と そっくりなの？\n私たち 初めて会うはずなのに\n懐かしい気持ち:
Why do you look so much like me? Why do I feel
like I've missed you when we've never met
before?

259974.ナラジアと 話がしてみたい。\nだけど 今は……\nただ ナラジアに助かってほし:
I want to talk to Narasia. But right now... we
just want Narasia to be saved.

259975.ザハディガル岩峰や バルディスタで目撃された\n謎のフードの集団。その正体は 大:
A mysterious group of hoods was spotted at Zahadigal Pinnacle and Valdista. They were actually a group of Heroes from Astoltia who
came to defeat the Great Demon King.

259976.勇者のアンルシアさんに 賢者のルシェンダさん。\nあなたの幼馴染の シンイさん。:
Hero, Ann, and Sage Lushenda. Your childhood
friend, Shini. Estella, the dragoness.

259977.魔界とアストルティアの溝は 深いけれど\nお互い 手を取り合って 助け合わなきゃ:
The gulf between Demon World and Astoltia is
deep, but we must take each other's hand and
help each other. Besides...

259978.勇者という立場や 魔瘴のことがなくても\nアンルシアさんたちと\n仲良くなれたら:
I would be happy if I could get along with Ann
and the others without having to deal with
Hero or demon miasma.

259979.魔仙卿を追って 向かった ゴダ神殿。\nその地底の奥深くには 大いなる闇の根源…:
I followed Oracle to Goda Temple. Deep within
the depths of the earth, the root of the great
darkness...Jagonuba, was sealed.

259980.広大な空間に 逆さまにそびえている\nジャゴヌバの神殿は 遠くから見ても\n不気:
The Jagonuba Temple, rising upside down in the
vastness of space, was eerie and awe-
inspiring, even from a distance.

259981.神殿に近付く間も 本当は 怖かった。\nだけど みんなが……あなたが いたから\:
The truth is, I was scared while approaching
the temple. But because of everyone... because
of you, I was able to go on.

259982.ジャゴヌバ神殿の 最深部で\nユシュカやアンルシアさんたちと\n協力して 暴虐の:
With Yushka, Anlucia, and the others, we
fought against that tyrannical dark deity in
the deepest part of the Temple of Jagonuba.

259983.邪神には勝てたけれど 何かを思いだしかけて\n私は 気を失ってしまった……あの記:
We were successful in defeating him, but... just as I was beginning to remember something, I blacked out... What was that memory? We
broke the temple's seal, Narasia and I... who are we...?

259984.知りたい…… でも 知るのが怖い。\n知ってしまったら 恐ろしいことが起きる。\:
I want to know... but I'm afraid to know. I'm
afraid that something terrible will happen if
I find out. I feel like...

259985.ネクロデア王国は ゾブリス将軍という人に\nひどいやり方で 滅ぼされてしまった…:
The kingdom of Necrodea was horrifically destroyed by someone known as General Zobris...but you and Najinn defeated her,
right?

259986.亡霊たちは 今も さまよっているけど\n時が過ぎれば あるべき場所に 還るはずだ:
The ghosts are still wandering around, but in
time they will return to where they belong.
Let them be...

259987.ところで お城の上空で 飛んでいる魔物たちは\n５０年くらい前に つがいでやって:
By the way, the monsters flying above the
castle came in pairs about 50 years ago and
built their nests in the steeple.

259988.おしゃべりな仮面さんが 教えてくれたの。\n巣で生まれた子供の はばたきを観察し:
A chatty masked man told me about it. He said
it was comforting to observe the fluttering of
the newborns in the nest.

259989.血潮の浜辺の 不思議な装置が 海水を吸い上げて\nまるで 風船みたいに ふくらま:
On Bloody Beach, a strange device sucked up the seawater and made it puff up like a balloon. The colors of the sky and the sea
blended together so beautifully.

259990.この仕掛けは ネクロデアの人たちが 物や人を\n安全に通行させるため 長い年月を:
I've heard from Yushka that this contraption was built by the people of Necrodea over a long period of time to allow safe passage for
things and people.

259991.道がない場所だからこそ 道を作ろうという\n熱意と誇りが 伝わってくる。\nその:
It is precisely because there are no roads in this place that I can feel their enthusiasm and pride in building roads. That passion will
not die out.

259992.ただ 干上がった浜辺に 取り残されてしまった\n海の生き物たちは すこし かわい:
However, I feel a little sorry for the sea creatures left behind on the dried up beach...? Hmmm. Let's be careful not to step
on them.

259993.トポルの村は 絵本みたいに\nかわいらしいところよね。\n私は とくに クラムベ:
Topol Village is as pretty as a picture book.
I especially like Crumberyl Clearing.

259994.満開のお花畑を 抜けた先の池に\n赤いクラムベリーが ぷかぷか浮いてるの。\nそ:
After passing through a field of flowers in
full bloom, there are red Crumbberries
floating in a pond. The view is so beautiful.

259995.……ベリーの絵を たくさん描いてたら\nなんだか お腹が空いてきちゃった。\nク:
...I painted so many pictures of berries, I
kind of got hungry. Crumb Pie...I want to try
it again...

259996.呪いの泉の水を飲むと その人が\n一番 恐れているものの姿に\nなってしまうのだ:
Drinking water from the Cursed Spring would
cause the person to take the form of whatever
it is that they fear most.

259997.呪いも怖いけど この泉も怖いよね……。\n後ろの木は まるで こっちにおいでって:
The Cursed Spring is scary, but this fountain
is scary, too... The tree behind it looks as
if it's beckoning me to come to it.

259998.私が 一番 恐ろしいものは……うーん？\nまた あの闇の中に戻ることになったら…:
What scares me the most is... hmm? Imagining
going back into that darkness again... that
would be... very scary.

259999.大魔王城は もちろん あなたのお城ね！\nあなたのおうちで……私のおうちでもある:
Great Demon King Castle is, of course, your
castle! It's your home... and mine, too.

260000.ユシュカから 大魔王城の話を聞いたときは\nびっくりしたけど ここで暮らせて 楽:
When Yushka told me about the Great Demon King
Castle, I was surprised, but I'm happy to live
here. Because I can see everyone anytime.

260001.ユシュカや ヴァレリアさんに アスバル。\nモモモや カーロウ……そして あなた:
Yushka, Valeria, Asbal. Sanguin, Carlow... and
you. I'm happy that you came to see my
paintings like this.

260002.大魔王顔壁は その名のとおり\n偉大な 大魔王の顔が 刻まれる場所ね。:
The Faces of Evil, as the name may suggest,
is where the faces of the Great Demon Kings
are carved.

260003.右から２番目は ペペロくんのおじいさんの\nマデサゴーラさん。\nそして １番右:
Second from the right is Madesagora, Pepero's
grandfather. And the first one on the right
is...phew!

260004.仮面の大魔王って なんだか かっこいいね！\nけど 魔界の人たちは知らない あな:
The Great Demon King Mask is kind of cool! But
it's kinda cool that I know your real face
that people in Demon World don't know.

262046.ヴァレリアさんは お花を受け取ってくれたけど\nなんだか さびしそうな顔をしてい:
Valeria received the flowers, but she looked
kind of sad. I wonder if I did something
wrong...

263890.女神ルティアナ様を 復活させる方法を聞くため\n私たちは 銀の森を抜けて\n光の:
In order to hear how to resurrect the Goddess
Lutiana, we had to go through the Silver
Forest to Light Town Finetka.

263891.森に入る前に ナラジアと会った。\nナラジアが ジャゴヌバの依代だなんて\nあの:
I met Narasia before we entered the forest. I
had no idea at the time that Narasia was a
follower of Jagonuba, but...

263892.銀の森は 不思議な霧に閉ざされていて\n女神像のツボからあふれる 光の花びらの導:
The Silver Forest was shrouded in a mysterious
mist, and the Light Petals from the statue's
Light Pot led me to Finetka.

263897.極天女帝さんは かわいらしい女の子だけど\n光の郷フィネトカの長老様で\nルティ:
Sky Empress is a pretty girl, but she is also
an elder of Light Town Finetka and an apostle
of Lutiana, the Six Saints.

263898.フィネトカで会ったときは 忘れていたけれど\n巡礼の試練によって 思いだした。\:
I had forgotten when we met in Finetka, but the trials of the pilgrimage brought back memories. Born as a vessel of the goddess, an
ancient memory.

263899.極天女帝……ばあやは 私とナラジアの子守役で\n私たちに とても やさしくしてく:
Sky Empress...Babaya was a babysitter for me
and Narasia and was very kind to us. I loved
her.

263900.アスバルから 教えてもらった\nアストルティアの 美しい景色のひとつ\nランドン:
Asbal told me about one of Astoltia's most
beautiful sights. It's called Cloudtop Lake,
in the Landon Mountains.

263901.はじめて行った雪山は すっごく寒かったけれど\n雪も湖も 白く青く かがやいて…:
It was very cold when I went to the snowy mountains for the first time, but the snow and the lake were shining white and blue... I
wanted to watch them forever.

263902.そして たどり着いた 雲上湖。\n実際に この目で見たときは 感動したわ。\n湖:
And then we arrived at Cloudtop Lake. I was so
impressed when I saw it with my own eyes. The
entire lake was frozen over!

263903.アスバルや 魔界のみんなにも 見せてあげたい。\n平和になったら 誰もが 気がね:
I want Asbal and everyone in Demon World to see it. I hope that when there is peace, everyone will be able to go to Astoltia
without any worries.

263904.カミハルムイには たくさんの桜の木が\n植えられていたけれど 樹齢 数百年だとい:
There were many cherry trees planted in Kamiharmui, but the largest tree in the courtyard of the castle, said to be several
hundred years old, was the most magnificent.

263905.空に向かって 大きく広がった枝から\n淡いピンク色の 可憐な花が\nこぼれ落ちそ:
Pale pink flowers bloomed so profusely that
they seemed to fall from the branches that
spread out toward the sky.

263906.スケッチするのも忘れて 見入っていたら\n桜の花びらが 一枚 ひらひら落ちて\n:
I forgot to sketch, and as I watched, a cherry
blossom petal fluttered down and stuck to my
hair.

263907.アンルシアが取ってくれたけど 彼女の髪にも\n花びらがついていて 笑っちゃった。:
Anlucia took it for me and I laughed because
she had petals in her hair too.

263908.はじめて アストルティアの青い海を見たとき\nいつか 絵に描いてみたいって 思っ:
The first time I saw the blue waters of
Astoltia, I knew I wanted to paint it someday!
I'm glad my wish came true in the end.

263909.寄せては返す 波のさざめき。髪をさらう\n潮風のかおり……。キラキラ海岸で\nス:
The rustle of the waves coming and going. The scent of the sea breeze brushing my hair... The time I spent sketching on the Glittering
Beach was so fulfilling.

263910.ゴダ神殿で目覚めた時 私は何も覚えてなかった。\nけど <pc>と一緒に いろん:
When I woke up in Goda Temple, I didn't
remember anything. But <pc> and I
went to many places and met many people.

263911.何もなかった私だけど 何もない\nからっぽのまま 消えるわけじゃない。\nこのス:
I was nothing, but that doesn't mean I will
disappear as an empty nothing. This sketchbook
is proof of that.

263912.これは 私……イルーシャの絵。\nペペロくんに スケッチブックをもらったときは\:
This is a drawing of me...Illusia. When Mr. Pepero gave me his sketchbook, I never imagined I would be drawing a picture of
myself.

263913.あなたに 連れていってもらって\nいろんな場所で 絵を描いたわ。\nあなたと一緒:
You took me to many places and I painted. I
saw many landscapes with you...

263914.この世界は 美しい。\n私は ここで 生きていきたい。\nスケッチしながら そう:
This world is beautiful. I want to live here.
I began to wish so while sketching.

263915.私 絵を描くのが 好きよ。\nそして それを 私に教えてくれた\nあなたのことが:
I love to paint. And I love you for teaching
me how to do it.

270343.ルシェンダさんの 呼びかけで\n叡智の冠と呼ばれる 賢者さんたちが\n集まってく:
At Sage Lushenda's call, a group of the Sages,
known as the Crown of Wisdom, gathered.

270344.とってもお茶目な ホーローさん。ずっと寝ている\nブロッゲンさんと おしゃべりな:
The very mischievous Mr. Hollow. Mr. Broggen, who sleeps all the time, and Mr. Cane, who talks a lot. Mr. Eidos is a little scary but
reliable.

270345.ジャゴヌバ神殿で 私たちを助けてくれた\nマリーンさんは 宝石魔術の使い手で\n:
Malynn, who saved us at the Temple of
Jagonuba, was a master of gem magic and
Yushka's mentor.

270346.大きくて 頼りがいのある マリーンさん。\n子供のころのユシュカが あこがれて\:
Malynn is big and dependable. I can understand
why Yushka, when she was a child, longed to
have her as an apprentice.

270349.ばあやは 私の運命を 悲しんでくれるけど\n私には 自分が消えてしまったとしても:
Grandmother is saddened by my fate, but there
are people I want to protect even if I
disappear. Grandmother is one of them.

270350.アンルシアも絵を 描いてくれたのに\n恥ずかしがって 消しちゃったの。彼女らしい:
Anlucia drew a picture for me, too, but she
was too shy to take it down. I liked it
because it was so typical of her.

272858.グラデル台地は 雄大な景色と\nあちこちに置かれた 不思議な彫刻の\n両方を 楽:
The Gradel Plateau is a place where you can
enjoy both the magnificent scenery and the
mysterious sculptures placed here and there.

272859.地面に穴があいてる場所があるって 気付いてた？\n地下に空洞があって 天井が崩れ:
Have you noticed that there are places where there are holes in the ground? There is an underground cavity and when the ceiling
collapses, a hole like that appears.

272860.ある彫刻家さんが その穴に落ちたことがあって\n救出された後も 三日三晩 泣いて:
I heard that a sculptor once fell down that hole and cried for three days and three nights after he was rescued. Poor guy...he must have
been so scared.

272861.それから 穴があいた場所や あきそうな場所は\n柵で囲うようにしたんですって。\:
Then, he fenced off all the holes and
potential openings. The sculptor's apprentice
told me about this.

272862.ゲルヘナ幻野で にらみ合ったまま動かない\nカエルさんと トカゲさん。\nスケッ:
Frog and Lizard are standing motionless,
staring at each other in the Gerhena Field. I
was so nervous while I was sketching.

272863.このトカゲさんは 魔界のあちこちに いるけど\nとくに ファラザードで よく見か:
These lizards can be found all over Demon
World, but especially in Farazard. ...in the
form of a roasted skewer.

272864.シシカバブ団の サティに勧められて\n私も 串焼きを 食べたことがあるの。\nお:
Sati from the Shish Kebab troupe once
recommended me to try their skewers. It was
delicious, but I felt guilty...

272865.フィネトカから見える 光の大穴。\nここだけでなく 魔界やアストルティアの各地で:
The Chasm of Light seen from Finetka. I
see rivers of light not only here, but also in
Demon World and other places in Astoltia.

272866.はるか神話の時代 鏡合わせの秘儀によって\nジャゴヌバの身体を封じた ルティアナ:
Mythical Age, the Lady Lutiana, who sealed Jagonuba's body with the secret of mirror matching, transformed her own body into a
river of light.

272867.そして 魔瘴で けがされた大地……\n魔界から アストルティアの地を守るため\n:
And to protect the land of Astoltia from the
demon miasma, he separated the two worlds with
his own body.

272868.魔界と アストルティアの狭間……。\n光の河の中にある ルファ神殿。:
Between the Demon World and Astoltia lies the
Rufa Temple in the River of Light.

272869.……ナラジアと一緒に\n神魂融合の儀を おこないに行ったときは\n見る余裕がなか:
I didn't have time to see it when I went with
Narasia to do the soul-melding ceremony, but
it's a solemn sight.

272870.ゴダ神殿の魔瘴石の像から 私が解き放たれたとき\nルファ神殿の女神像の中で ナラ:
When I was freed from the statue of the miasma stone in Goda Temple, Narasia awoke in the statue of the goddess in Rufa Temple. For we
were created to contain each other.

272871.ナラジアは 自分の中に封じられた\nジャゴヌバの魂に 飲み込まれてしまった。\n:
Narasia was swallowed up by the spirit of
Jagonuba that was sealed inside her. But the
Narasia I knew... was a good girl.

272872.ゼクレス城からの通路の出口にある 滝見の広場。\n滝の流れ落ちる音と 水のせせら:
Fallsview Plaza is located at the exit of the passage from Zechres Castle. A peaceful place where the only sounds are the cascading
waterfalls and rushing water.

272873.子供のころのアスバルは\nイヤなことがあると ここに来て\n滝を ながめていたん:
As a child, Asbal used to come here to gaze at
the waterfall whenever he had a bad day.

272874.たしかに 悲しいことも つらいことも\n洗い流してくれるような……\nそんな や:
Indeed, I feel a kindness that washes away
sadness and pain.

272875.バルディスタ城の窓から ながめた景色。\nスケッチをしている間も ずっと\n涼し:
A view from the window of Valdista Castle. It
was nice to have a cool breeze blowing in
while I was sketching.

272876.ヴァレリアさんも よく 窓の前に立って\n景色をながめているそうよ。大魔王城での:
Valeria often stands in front of the window and looks out at the view. Bertro, who was drunk during the banquet at the Great Demon
King's castle, told me about it.

272877.ヴァレリアさんは 町を ながめながら\nどんなことを 思うのかな？\nふふ。なん:
I wonder what Valeria thinks as she looks out over the town? I wonder what Valeria thinks as she looks out over the town. I feel like I
want to talk to you.

272878.ヴァレリアさんの焼いてくれるパイも とっても\nおいしいの！ アンルシアも誘って:
Valeria bakes the most delicious pies! Maybe I
should invite Anlucia to come to Valdista with
me?

272879.ザードの尖塔の てっぺんは\nとても高くて 強い風が吹いて……\nすこし怖いけど:
The top of the Zard Spire is so high and the
wind is blowing so hard... it's a little
scary, but it's refreshing.

272880.じつは 私 魔界大戦が起きる直前……\nファラザードに 連れ去られている間に\n:
Actually, I climbed here once just before the
Demon World War while Farazard was taking me
away.

272881.ユシュカが築いた ファラザードは\n人々も町も 活気にあふれているのが\n遠くか:
Even from afar, I could tell that the people
and the town of Farazard, built by Yushka,
were full of vitality.

272882.この景色を もう一度\nあなたと一緒に見たいって 思ってたの。\n願いを かなえ:
I've always wanted to see this view with you
again. Thank you for granting my wish!

282645.光の河から 分かたれて……\n最初に 思い浮かんだのは あなたの姿だった。:
As I parted from the river of light the first
thing that came to mind was you.

282646.あなたに会いたい。\nそう思って……気が付いたら\n私は ここに いたの。:
I want to meet you. That's what I thought...
and then I found myself here.
